Favicons folder

Place optimized favicon files here:
- favicon.ico (contains 16×16, 32×32, 48×48)
- favicon-16x16.png (16×16)
- favicon-32x32.png (32×32)
- favicon-96x96.png (96×96)
- apple-touch-icon.png (180×180)

Notes:
- Keep file sizes small (<10 KB where possible) and use pngquant/mozjpeg optimizations.
- I can generate these for you from logo-symbol.svg if you prefer.
